meanings.definition: A phylum of marine invertebrates characterized by a U-shaped gut and a ring of tentacles surrounding the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The endoprocts in the ocean have unique tentacles around their mouths.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the endoprocts to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The endoprocts decided to throw a tentacle-themed party in the deep sea.
meanings.sent4: Like a mysterious underwater ballet, the endoprocts gracefully move their tentacles.
meanings.sent5: Children at the aquarium were mesmerized by the endoprocts' tentacles.

meanings.definition: An organism belonging to the phylum Endoprocta.
meanings.sent1: The endoprocts found in the research lab were carefully observed.
meanings.sent2: A rare endoprocts species was discovered deep in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The endoprocts were excited to attend the annual marine convention.
meanings.sent4: In the world of marine biology, the endoprocts are like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The endoprocts' unique features make them stand out among other marine organisms.
